Html: I.e. can we write .ts files with .ts and have it compile to .js and have our pages link to the .ts and debug into the .ts file instead of the .js file?

You should just be able to install the VS extension and follow the answer in this:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/12680486/how-do-i-add-typescript-to-an-existing-asp-net-mvc-project
